title: Honeymoon Blues
description: After being so cruelly dumped by her fianc√© weeks before their Valentines Day wedding, Ava Ramirez could be forgiven for going on honeymoon alone, in the hope of finding herself again.Visiting Verona, the last thing she expected was to fall in love. Falling for Nico Cazale, the devastatingly handsome and rich son of a hotel magnate, a man every woman wants, has its fair share of heartache.When her insecurities resurface, leading Ava to believe that she isn't good enough, or enough, for Nico, she rushes back home to Denver and tries to forget she ever laid eyes on hm.But a shattering turn of events pulls her back to Italy.Are second chances possible?
